concept.title: Configure STS Actions
concept.shortdesc: The Security Token Service (STS) allows you to enable or disable specific token actions.

conbody.p: By default, the enabled actions list is empty. However, this means that all actions are enabled. To enable specific actions, you must list them in the enabledactions property. To deny specific actions, you must list them in the disabledactions property.

The values are case insensitive space or comma-separated lists of token service actions.
If an action is in the disable list then it will not be permitted and the request will fail with HTTP status 503 and the code ServiceUnavailable.
If the enable list is non-empty then only the actions specifically listed will be permitted (though any action also in the denied list will be denied)
